predicate.note: Frames file for 'peal' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.2, Framenet entry Perception_noise.

roleset.name: (cause to) emit sound like a bell

example.name: bells are ap-pealing
example.text: Mr. Hammond worries that old age and the flightiness of youth will diminish the ranks of the East Anglian group that keeps the Aslacton bells pealing.

roleset.note: As opposed to peeling an orange.
